text: ninnukeāṇṭuṁ irunnu keāṇṭuṁ kiṭannu keāṇṭuṁ allāhuve ōrmikkukayuṁ, ākāśaṅṅaḷuṭeyuṁ bhūmiyuṭeyuṁ sr̥ṣṭiyepaṟṟi cinticc keāṇṭirikkukayuṁ ceyyunnavaratre avar. (avar paṟayuṁ:) ñaṅṅaḷuṭe rakṣitāvē! nī nirart'thakamāyi sr̥ṣṭiccatalla it‌. nī etrayēā pariśud'dhan! atināl narakaśikṣayil ninn ñaṅṅaḷe kātturakṣikkaṇē
